title: Leek Broth
directions: Chop vegetables in small pieces. Gently steam green tops of leek and vegetables in clarified butter for approximately 15 minutes with the lid on.
Salt, pepper, and add water and herb bouquet; cook for 1 hour (skim if necessary).
Filter broth with fine china cap (keep vegetables to use later in a soup or vegetable pur√©e).
Clarify broth with egg white and raw vegetables if desired.
ingredients: 45 ml (3 tbsp) clarified butter or oil
Grey sea salt and pepper to taste
1 herb bouquet (thyme, bay leaves and parsley)
